column5: well, here it is the sled that went from this   to this!   the dog likes it too  with OEM decals still to come!  proudly,  JP
Looks great. Put an OFC decal on it also though.
Nice job BRN  Is that a new hood or did you paint and decal it?  Cheers  Craig
nope same hood. no decals on it though. those are soon to come.
Looks good...this gonna be a total restoration?
That's great!!  Your dog is like "I am SO badass"  LOL
Get him a helmut ! He may want to go with you, lol.

yup. total restoration. its goin in next year to be professionally painted, and i'll be doing an engine rebuild myself. took it out for a little spin today and it was great.... and the dog, well.... she was just chassin me down haha.
